creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: small medallion incised with dragon; loop of chain with twisted round and floral links at top; three similar dangling chains at bottom of medallion; two chains have fish pendants -- one has claw topped with silver cap, silver animal claw
dimension: 5 5/16 x 7/8 x 3/8 in. (13.49 x 2.22 x 0.95 cm) (including chain at top and pendants)
title: Pendant (?), one of a pair
